org.mule.modules.cassandradb

Class CassandraDBConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mule.modules.cassandradb.CassandraDBConnector

  • @Connector(name="cassandradb",
           schemaVersion="3.2",
           friendlyName="CassandraDB",
           minMuleVersion="3.6")
@RequiresEnterpriseLicense(allowEval=true)
public class CassandraDBConnector
extends Object
    The Apache Cassandra database is the right choice when you need scalability and high availability without compromising performance. Cassandra's ColumnFamily data model offers the convenience of column indexes with the performance of log-structured updates, strong support for materialized views, and powerful built-in caching.
    Author:
    MuleSoft, Inc.

    • Method Detail

      • createKeyspace

        @Processor
public boolean createKeyspace(@RefOnly@Default(value="#[payload]")
                               CreateKeyspaceInput input)
                       throws CassandraDBException
        Creates a new keyspace
        Parameters:
        input - operation input containing the keyspace name and the replication details
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise
        Throws:
        CassandraDBException - if any error occurs when executing the create keyspace operation

      • dropKeyspace

        @Processor
public boolean dropKeyspace(String keyspaceName)
                     throws CassandraDBException
        Drops the entire keyspace
        Parameters:
        keyspaceName - the name of the keyspace to be dropped
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise
        Throws:
        CassandraDBException - if any error occurs when executing the drop keyspace operation

      • createTable

        @Processor
public boolean createTable(@RefOnly@Default(value="#[payload]")
                            CreateTableInput input)
                    throws CassandraDBException
        Creates a table(column family) in a specific keyspace; If no keyspace is specified the keyspace used for login will be used
        Parameters:
        input - operation input describing the table name, the keyspace name and the list of columns
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise
        Throws:
        CassandraDBException - if any error occurs when executing the create table operation

      • dropTable

        @Processor
public boolean dropTable(String tableName,
                          @Optional
                          String keyspaceName)
                  throws CassandraDBException
        Drops an entire table form the specified keyspace or from the keyspace used for login if none is specified as an operation parameter
        Parameters:
        tableName - the name of the table to be dropped
        keyspaceName - (optional) the keyspace which contains the table to be dropped
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise
        Throws:
        CassandraDBException - if any error occurs when executing the drop table operation

      • executeCQLQuery

        @Processor(friendlyName="Execute CQL Query")
public List<Map<String,Object>> executeCQLQuery(@Placement(group="Query")@RefOnly@Default(value="#[payload]")
                                                 CQLQueryInput input)
                                         throws CassandraDBException
        Executes the raw input query provided
        Parameters:
        input - CQLQueryInput describing the parametrized query to be executed along with the parameters
        Returns:
        the result of the query execution
        Throws:
        CassandraDBException - if any error occurs when executing the custom query

      • insert

        @Processor
@MetaDataScope(value=CassandraMetadataCategory.class)
public void insert(@MetaDataKeyParam(affects=INPUT)
                                                                 String table,
                                                                 @Optional
                                                                 String keyspaceName,
                                                                 @RefOnly@Default(value="#[payload]")
                                                                 Map<String,Object> entity)
            throws CassandraDBException
        Executes the insert entity operation
        Parameters:
        table - the table name in which the entity will be inserted
        keyspaceName - (optional) the keyspace which contains the table to be used
        entity - the entity to be inserted
        Throws:
        CassandraDBException - if any error occurs when executing the insert query

      • update

        @Processor
@MetaDataScope(value=CassandraWithFiltersMetadataCategory.class)
public void update(@MetaDataKeyParam(affects=INPUT)
                                                                            String table,
                                                                            @Optional
                                                                            String keyspaceName,
                                                                            @RefOnly@Default(value="#[payload]")
                                                                            Map<String,Object> entity)
            throws CassandraDBException
        Executes the update entity operation
        Parameters:
        table - the table name in which the entity will be updated
        keyspaceName - (optional) the keyspace which contains the table to be dropped
        entity - the entity to be updated
        Throws:
        CassandraDBException - if any error occurs when executing the update query

      • deleteColumnsValue

        @Processor
@MetaDataScope(value=CassandraWithFiltersMetadataCategory.class)
public void deleteColumnsValue(@MetaDataKeyParam(affects=INPUT)
                                                                                        String table,
                                                                                        @Optional
                                                                                        String keyspaceName,
                                                                                        @RefOnly@Default(value="#[payload]")
                                                                                        Map<String,Object> payload)
                        throws CassandraDBException
        Deletes values from an object specified by the where clause
        Parameters:
        table - the name of the table
        keyspaceName - (optional) the keyspace which contains the table to be used
        payload - operation input: columns to be deleted and where clause for the delete operation
        Throws:
        CassandraDBException - if any error occurs when executing the delete query

      • deleteRows

        @Processor
@MetaDataScope(value=CassandraOnlyWithFiltersMetadataCategory.class)
public void deleteRows(@MetaDataKeyParam(affects=INPUT)
                                                                                    String table,
                                                                                    @Optional
                                                                                    String keyspaceName,
                                                                                    @RefOnly@Default(value="#[payload]")
                                                                                    Map<String,Object> payload)
                throws CassandraDBException
        Deletes an entire record
        Parameters:
        table - the name of the table
        keyspaceName - (optional) the keyspace which contains the table to be used
        payload - operation input: where clause for the delete operation
        Throws:
        CassandraDBException - if any error occurs when executing the delete query

      • select

        @Processor
@MetaDataScope(value=CassandraMetadataCategory.class)
public List<Map<String,Object>> select(@Default(value="#[payload]")@Query
                                                                                     String query,
                                                                                     @Optional
                                                                                     List<Object> parameters)
                                throws CassandraDBException
        Executes a select query
        Parameters:
        query - the query to be executed
        parameters - the query parameters
        Returns:
        list of entities returned by the select query
        Throws:
        CassandraDBException - if any error occurs when executing the select query

public List<String> getTableNamesFromKeyspace(@Optional
                                               String keyspaceName)
                                       throws CassandraDBException
        Returns all the table names from the specified keyspace
        Parameters:
        keyspaceName - the name of the keyspace to be used on the operation
        Returns:
        a list of table names
        Throws:
        CassandraDBException - if any error occurs when executing the operation

      • changeColumnType

        @Processor(friendlyName="Change the type of a column")
public boolean changeColumnType(String table,
                                 @Optional
                                 String keyspaceName,
                                 @RefOnly@Default(value="#[payload]")
                                 AlterColumnInput input)
        Changes the type of a column - check compatibility here: CQL type compatibility
        Parameters:
        table - the name of the table to be used for the operation
        keyspaceName - (optional) the keyspace which contains the table to be used
        input - POJO defining the name of the column to be changed and the new DataType
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded or false if not

      • addNewColumn

        @Processor(friendlyName="Add new column")
public boolean addNewColumn(String table,
                             @Optional
                             String keyspaceName,
                             @RefOnly@Default(value="#[payload]")
                             AlterColumnInput input)
                     throws CassandraDBException
        Adds a new column
        Parameters:
        table - the name of the table to be used for the operation
        keyspaceName - (optional) the keyspace which contains the table to be used
        input - POJO defining the name of the new column and its DataType
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded or false if not
        Throws:
        CassandraDBException - if any error occurs when executing the operation

      • dropColumn

        @Processor(friendlyName="Remove column")
public boolean dropColumn(String table,
                           @Optional
                           String keyspaceName,
                           @RefOnly@Default(value="#[payload]")
                           String columnName)
        Removes a column
        Parameters:
        table - the name of the table to be used for the operation
        keyspaceName - (optional) the keyspace which contains the table to be used
        columnName - the name of the column to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded or false if not

      • renameColumn

        @Processor(friendlyName="Rename column")
public boolean renameColumn(String table,
                             @Optional
                             String keyspaceName,
                             @Default(value="#[payload]")
                             String oldColumnName,
                             String newColumnName)
        Renames a column
        Parameters:
        table - the name of the table to be used for the operation
        keyspaceName - (optional) the keyspace which contains the table to be used
        oldColumnName - the name of the column to be changed
        newColumnName - the new value for the name of the column
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded or false if not
